data.name: BECKONED
data.detailed_description:
BECKONED is a single-player adventure, driven by progressive role-playing combat mechanics.
The story follows a boy (Taujh) searching for a crystal pendant which could contain his lost memories. Accompanied by two others (Enelh and Leign), they scurry across the landscape of Devanis while being swept up in a whirlwind of trouble. Mastering their surroundings and choosing to help a land riddled with fear, they must reclaim the pendant before its lost for good and maybe then, Taujh will finally know who he is. Release date and price is TBA.

***Dev Note:
We are beginners, breakin' all the rules. We are making a high-def, hand-animated, cinematic, 20-hour epic, JRPG using Unreal4 Blueprint engine. Hope everyone enjoys!

data.short_description: A Meticulously Handcrafted Epic Adventure, with a Real-Time Twist to JRPG Turn Base Combat Systems. Master the environment and challenge morale-crushing bosses with the help from majiq Loden Shards found along the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A10-5800k APU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Hd Graphics 3.80 GHz
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeFORCE GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
